snippet: Robert E. Meyerhoff and Rheda Becker have donated 30 photographs by prominent contemporary artists to the National Gallery of Art.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; Robert E Meyerhoff and Rheda Becker donate 30 photographs by prominent contemporary artists to National Gallery of Art; Ed Ruscha's hand-painted mural on outside wall of apartment building overlooking High Line is artist's first public commission in New York; Museum of Contemporary Art San Diego chooses New York architect Annabelle Selldorf for expansion that will triple size of its exhibition space; Foundation for Art and Preservation in Embassies plans to showcase its collection in show.
lead_paragraph: Robert E. Meyerhoff and Rheda Becker have donated 30 photographs by prominent contemporary artists to the National Gallery of Art.

headline.main: Contemporary Photos Given to National Gallery

keywords.value: Foundation for Art and Preservation in Embassies
keywords.name: organizations
